name: Light: A Maze Game
description:
In a dark and disturbed universe, there are a few moments of light for us to go on and sometimes it is necessary to move in the darkness, in the hope that we are going in the right path. Light: A Maze Game is, overall, a game about this universe, it is a simple game with a fun, challenging and, as it must be, profound mechanic.

There are 126 levels, in each one you start somewhere in a maze. To get out you have to be carreful not to touch anything, walls or enemies, in addition you have a time limit to finish the level. You need to pass every level to play the next one, but you can re-play it anytime, beating your own, or your friends, records.
